scenes.action_text: BELOVED Written by Richard LaGravenese Based on the Novel by Toni Morrison October 11, 1996 FADE IN... EXT. 124 BLUESTONE ROAD - DAWN. It is winter in Ohio. A house sits isolated beside a barren field. The field stretches beyond, until a line of distant woods stops it. Around the back of the house stands a rundown STORAGE SHED, a cold house, a privy and a water pump. A porch with a single door serves as the only entrance. Camera be
